Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains a number of small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with cream-coloured slip and very faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393530) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393530)
